name: Random Quote Generator
altText: A blue background with a white textbox centered inside, which shows a quote from Ratatouille, with a Twitter icon in the lower left and a new quote button on the lower right.
description: Pulls a random quote from a separate JSON file and displays it. Also provides the ability to create a Tweet sharing the quote. I created the JSON file with a ton of my favorite quotes to use for this project, and adjusted the styling to change coordinating colors when a new quote is generated.
